Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products AFP Reagent Pack
VITROS® Immunodiagnostic Products AFP Reagent Pack
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products AFP Reagent Pack for quantitative measurement of alpha-fetoprotein using immunometric assay on VITROS 5600 system.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) concentrations in human serum using the VITROS 5600 Integrated system to aid in management of patients with non-seminomatous testicular cancer.
